subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=경|eumhun=|rv=gyeong|mr=kyŏng|y=kyeng}}

# Shining, glowing
# Brightening, illuminating
# Heat
# A Korean family name (pronounced [[계]], Romanized as Gye or Kye)
# (When pronounced as Gye or Kye) appearance of smoke being formed from something that is burning
